PUNISH.command.mute.en-US: [grey][green]Successfully</color> muted the player [era_purple][player]</color> for [era_purple][duration]</color> and with reason [era_purple][reason]!</color></color>

PUNISH.command.ban.en-US: [grey][green]Successfully</color> banned the player [era_purple][player]</color> for [era_purple][duration]</color> and with reason [era_purple][reason]!</color></color>
